Nothing lasts forever,
Even weather needs to change.
Gardens need the summer sun,

Raindrops are falling from the sky,

Do I love raindrops? 🎶

Helping all the flowers bloom,

Rainbow… 🌈
The rain beside the sun,
Beside the rain becomes a rainbow.
Red beside the orange hue,
Yellow and the green and blue,
Indigo and violet shape,
Colours shining through the rain.

Rainbows… raindrops…
Nothing lasts forever,
Even summer has an end.
But every little raindrop
Becomes your little rainbow friend. 💖🌈
